# dataValueType

**Type Property**

The underlying type the conforming type uses when it wraps itself in a data value.

## Declaration

```swift
static var dataValueType: MLDataValue.ValueType { get }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLDataValue/ValueType] for a list of available options.

## Converting from a type’s instance to a data value

- **dataValue**: The value of the conforming type’s instance wrapped in a data value.
